name: Life is Boring
description:
A game that is kinda not boring.

If you stuck anywhere and dont know what to do. JUST PLEASE WATCH THE FULL GAMEPLAY VIDEO. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6gEnwivHvp0

Patrick is a guy, who is living in a boring gray city.Everything looks same and dull.  The new bleeding edge  technology comes in to the city.  Introducing, the machine that gives you chance to live in a game that you like.

 When you want to use the  special attack of Quick Take down, as you swap the camera to FPS to do so, please do not move. You can rotate. There is a bug and i am too lazy to fix it.  If you move just click "U" twice to reset positions so it does not bug and land on the enemy and kill it.

  While using FIRFIR  you do not have to spam left or right click  it works fine. If firfir doesnt return it means that it is actually returning but cuz of gravity under water it is very down there and it takes a lot of time to retun. So just killyourself if you dont want to wait. 

At the first level please wait cutscene to end and dont move. I didnt lock the character movement. It doesnt bug but just dont move and watch dont be a jerk. And again in this level i didnt freeze rotation so if you hit any wall and flip, TOO BAD, alt f4 xd. 

If you stuck anywhere and dont know what to do. JUST PLEASE WATCH THE FULL GAMEPLAY VIDEO.
